channel.title: Microbiome on Yan Hui
channel.description: Recent content in Microbiome on Yan Hui

item.title: Tutorial for microbiome analysis in R
item.description: What you will work on Preparation Build phyloseq project Check the sequencing depth with rarefaction curves Alpha diversity Beta diversity Abundance bar plot Differential abundance analysis DESeq2 ANCOM-BC BEFORE YOU START: This is a tutorial to analyze microbiome data with R. The tutorial starts from the processed output from metagenomic sequencing, i.e. feature matrix. It’s suitable for R users who wants to have hand-on tour of the microbiome world. This tutorial cover the common microbiome analysis e.
